alert.note: Alert for Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 5:53AM MDT until July 11 at 6:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CROOK COUNTY... At 552 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Vore Buffalo Jump, or 7 miles east of Sundance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Crook County, east of Sundance and south of Beulah. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 192 and 200. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
